name: ObserVRtarium
description: Interact, immerse, inspire. Step into our virtual museum and explore our collection of amazing Space objects.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later, or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 307 MB available space
